content.text: Hey, not much. Just got back from golfing. My mom would be proud.
That's great. Golfing is fun but I'm not very good.
It's hard to get good at it but it's a great way to relax.
I agree. I enjoy the outdoors so I like to hike and go camping.
That sounds like fun. I'm not much of an outdoors person but I like to draw and paint.
That's awesome. I love to draw too. I'm not very good but it's a great way to express yourself.
I totally agree. I love to draw pictures of my family and friends.
That's sweet. I like to draw animals and landscapes.
That sounds really cool. I'd love to see some of your work sometime.
Sure! I'd be happy to show you.
